source_setting.source: select cpc.sequence, cpc.section_id, cpc.subsection_id, cpc.group_id, cpc.subgroup_id, cpc.patent_id as patent_number from PatentsView_20210330.cpc_current as cpc where cpc.patent_id in (select p.patent_id from PatentsView_20210330.patent as p where year(p.date)=2020 and month(p.date)>=9) ORDER BY cpc.patent_id LIMIT {limit} offset {offset};
source_setting.count_source: select COUNT(1) from PatentsView_20210330.cpc_current as cpc where cpc.patent_id in (select p.patent_id from PatentsView_20210330.patent as p where year(p.date)=2020 and month(p.date)>=9);
